alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Ellis; Johnson; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 08 at 10:41PM CDT until September 08 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Johnson County in north central Texas... Southeastern Tarrant County in north central Texas... Northwestern Ellis County in north central Texas... Southwestern Dallas County in north central Texas... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1040 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Crowley, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Worth, Arlington, Grand Prairie, Mansfield, Bedford, Cedar Hill, Haltom City, Hurst, Burleson, Cleburne, Midlothian, Crowley, Forest Hill, Richland Hills, Kennedale, Everman, Keene, Joshua, Alvarado, and Rendon. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35W between mile markers 15 and 51. Interstate 20 between mile markers 433 and 455. Interstate 30 between mile markers 15 and 28. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
